page.title: 01PORCHFIELD VILLAGE.
page.content: In Porchfield there is a wood called the Burnt Wood.It leads down to Newtown beach.There is a rifle range near the beach it is about half a square kilometre big.There are no real shops in Porchfield except the one that is called Porchfield Village Post Office.Farming is very important and there are lots of farms in Porchfield. Colemans farm house is the oldest building in the village.There are more fields than houses in Porchfield.There is a pub, it is called the Sportsman's Rest and every year there are cricket matches on the field near the pub. There are two churches in Porchfield, one is still used but the other one is deserted.
